shared.proxy

Class ServerProxy

  • java.lang.Object
    • shared.proxy.ServerProxy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Proxy

    public class ServerProxy
extends java.lang.Object
implements Proxy
    Proxy used by the client to send commands to the server
    Author:
    Kent
